A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
Awful
Turns out all the Rebels ever needed were a few ships willing to go into hyperspace to take out any Star Destroyer or Death Star....talk about Deus Ex Machina.
Disney has taken The Force\, and like they inevitably do with anything truly cool\, turned it into a commodity.
No dignity\,  no subtlety anf no mystery.
Spiritual Materialism alive and well.
Mind you the whole franchise was already shot. The fact we turn up with any hope left at all is down to Joseph Cambell and the mythic foundation he laid with the first two movies....now the archetypal structure lies in ruins...we are truly in the Wasteland. 
Avoid!
